tool_description:
Postcodes4u by 3X Software
Search the Royal Mail PAF database for a list of addresses from a UK postcode or search for an address based on address id
name: Postcodes 4 U UK Address Finder
title: Postcodes 4 U UK Address Finder

api_list.name: Search by Postcode (XML)
api_list.description: Search Royal Mail PAF database for list of addresses based on postcode (XML)

api_list.name: Search By Postcode (JSON)
api_list.description: Search Royal Mail PAF database for a list of addresses based on a postcode, get results in JSON format

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: name of your javascript callback funtion

api_list.name: Search By Address Id (XML)
api_list.description: Search Royal Mail PAF database by address id

api_list.name: Search By Address Id (JSON)
api_list.description: Search the PAF Royal Mail database for an address based on address id

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: the name of your javascript callback function
